mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id userId, u.username, u.password, u.email, u.mobile, u.STATUS, u.create_time createTime, u.ssex sex, u.dept_id deptId, u.update_time updateTime, u.description, u.avatar, u.tenant_id tenantId, any_value(d.dept_name) deptName, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT sm.perms ) perms, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT r.role_id ) roleId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT r.ROLE_NAME ) roleName, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT p.post_id ) postId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT p.post_name ) postName FROM sys_users_gitee sug LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON (sug.users_id = u.user_id) LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON (u.dept_id = d.dept_id) LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON (u.user_id = sur.user_id) LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.role_id = sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_post up ON (u.user_id = up.user_id) LEFT JOIN sys_post p ON p.post_id = up.post_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON (sr.role_id = sur.ROLE_ID) LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON (srm.role_id = sr.role_id) LEFT JOIN sys_menu sm ON (sm.id = srm.menu_id) WHERE u.STATUS = 1 AND sug.id = #{id} AND sug.appid = #{appid} GROUP BY u.username, u.user_id, u.email, u.mobile, u.STATUS, u.create_time, u.ssex, u.dept_id, u.update_time, u.description, u.avatar
